name: Forever Storm
description:
Made in less than 16 hours for the 48 secret jam.
There is an .exe file available below if the game does not load in your browser.

Story

You and your pirate crew have sailed to a mysterious region in the ocean called Forever Storm. 

Legends say a sea monster has made that place its home, destroying all ships that get close.

Controls

Use the arrow keys to use the 3 different actions, more is explained in-game.

Music written by me, see https://soundcloud.com/tom-dobbelaere/forever-storm
